name: The Amphitheater
description:
You are in a small amphitheater.  Rows of comfortable looking chairs
circle a large podium.  The echos of your footsteps seem very loud here.
   The only apparent exit leads north to the hallway.

exits.keywords: door sturdy iron~ 1 -1 2555 S #2558 A Hallway~    You are in a long hallway leading east and west.  The walls emit a faint magical glow providing enough light to see by.    A small door can be seen to the south.
